articles.title: PSG confirm the signing of Liverpool midfielder Georginio Wijnaldum for free - Daily Mail
articles.description: PSG have announced the signing of Georginio Wijnaldum. He had attracted interest from several European giants including Bayern Munich and Barcelona but chose PSG.
articles.content:

articles.title: Solar Eclipse 2021: The 'Ring of Fire' Photos From Around The World - NPR
articles.description: If you didn't wake up early enough to see Thursday's solar eclipse yourself, photographers from the U.S. to Asia to Europe snapped images of the striking astronomical event.
articles.content:
The sun is partially eclipsed as it rises over lower Manhattan in New York on Thursday.
Seth Wenig/AP
An annular solar eclipse occurred Thursday morning. Some viewers across the globe saw the moon … [+518 chars]

articles.title: 'Europe is not the EU!' Guy Verhofstadt torn apart for deluded reaction to damning poll - Daily Express
articles.description: A DELUDED Guy Verhofstadt hailed results from a recent EU poll showing increasing discontent with Brussels among citizens.
